Overview.Title: Graph Tasks
Overview.Text:
We are conducting an academic study about Graph Visualizations. We need to understand your views about a graph visualization by performing a couple of graph tasks.
You will be presented with an interactive graph visualization and you will be performing tasks such as determining whether 2 highlighted nodes are directly connected, or have a path between them. This HIT will not work with Internet Explorer, so please use Mozilla Firefox or Google Chrome browser to perform this HIT. You will be answering yes or no to these questions.
